title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Sunset among the palms and cypress trees Richard Eskin  Discover the rich culture and the stories of the western everglades and explore the mosaic of plants and animals that thrive in the diverse environment of Big Cypress National Preserve.  Find out the recent events happening in the preserve and tour the area through photos.   News Stay connected with Big Cypress and get information on current events   Photos & Multimedia Browse photos, watch an introductory video to the preserve and take a virtual hike.   History & Culture The human story of Big Cypress spans thousands of years   Nature  Discover the dynamic and diverse land and water of Big Cypress that are home to hundreds of animal and plant species.   Education Whether your class is in the park or visiting online, wonderful opportunities for learning and adventure await your students   Kids & Youth Become a junior ranger and explore the park   Management Learn about the laws and policies that apply to Big Cypress, the staff that manages the preserve, and park statistics    Bookstore Support and learn more about the preserve with your purchase    Â    calendar of events
